Because they can't make daddies?

I've been using propolis for about 20 years now, I have 2 friends around NYC that have apiaries and give me a bag of it every time they harvest.  I'll separate it from the wax, freeze it, grind it, then mix it with pure ethanol to make a tincture.  I mix the tincture with a bit of glycerin then put it in small vials with an eye dropper.  Get a cut, propolis on a band aid and the pain goes away, sore throat, stuff is magic.  Even cold sores go away, but it's brown so I usually stay inside when I use it.  So many uses for that stuff!
